thread.title: Watch Gollum actor Andy Serkis in Brexit video mocking Theresa May - Devon Live

author: Richard Booth
title: Watch Gollum actor Andy Serkis in Brexit video mocking Theresa May - Devon Live
text:
Watch Gollum actor Andy Serkis in Brexit video mocking Theresa May Serkis can be seen in a silver wig, makeup and a blue women's blazer Share Richard Booth Head of Content 20:00, 9 DEC 2018 Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Get Daily updates directly to your inbox Subscribe Thank you for subscribing See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email
Andy Serkis, famed for his role as Gollum in The Lord of the Rings movies, has released a spoof video mocking the current Brexit situation.
The almost 3-minute-long clip shows Serkis combine both Gollum, a fictional character from Lord of the Rings, with the Prime Minister.
Serkis can be seen in a silver wig, makeup and a blue women's blazer.
The parody video, which was posted on the "We Wants It " Facebook page is captioned: "We's in a nasty mess my precioussss...and there's only one way out....We wants it. We neeeeds it!"
The clip opens with a political staffer handing Theresa May her Brexit agreement, to which she reacts with Gollum's trademark "precious". Read More
